welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zhengzhou, the ancient capital of China with its rich history and vibrant culture. Get ready to explore the city's famous Shaolin Temple, breathtaking Yellow River, and mouthwatering local cuisine. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Zhengzhou has to offer!"
